name: Leviathans Online: Monsters In The Sky (Canceled)
blurb: Bringing the steampunkesque, naval-to-air warship tactical game to a 3D online game for tablet, browser & mobile platforms.

rewards.reward: AIRMAN: You support turning tabletop miniature games into full properties and support small studio development!

ABLE AIRMAN:
Copy of the game (Platform choice)        / 
Exclusive background wallpapers (Lieutenant grade, faction + Leviathan) / 
Lieutenants Forum/Community Backer Avatar (Bronze only) / 
Digital Lieutenant License (Printable)

LEADING AIRMAN:
Able Airman Rewards 
+ Access to exclusive Faction polls in forum (Post-launch)
 + Beta Access Key

PETTY OFFICER:
Leading Airman Rewards
 w/ 2x Copies of the game (Platform choice)
 w/ Commander Forum Backer Avatar (Silver only) 
+ Digital 'Commander License' (Printable) / NOTE: Not combinable with prior digital copy reward

CHIEF PETTY OFFICER:
Petty Officer Rewards
 w/ Priority Beta Access Key
 + Your name in the credits as ‘Backer’
 + Leviathans small 'Boatswain Whistle'

ENSIGN:
Chief Petty Officer Rewards
 + Free iTunes download of Game Soundtrack
 + Small 'Boatswain Whistle'
 + Small painted 'ship bust' (Choice of type, faction)

LIEUTENANT:
Copy of the game (Platform choice) / 
Exclusive background wallpaper (Lieutenant edition) / 
Lieutenant’s Forum/Community Backer Avatar (Gold only) / 
Digital Lieutenant License (Printable) / 
Access to exclusive Faction polls in forum (Post-launch) / 
Priority Beta Access Key / 
Free iTunes download of Game Soundtrack / 
Your Name in the credits as ' Honorary Backer' / 
Scenario editor + unique 'Planner' community avatar / 
Medium size painted 'ship bust' (Choice of type, faction) / 
1 exclusive backer T-shirt (Leviathan only) /

LIEUTENANT COMMANDER:
Lieutenant Rewards
 w/ 2 exclusive backer t-shirts (choice of faction and Leviathan)
 w/ Your name in the credits as ‘Elite Backer’
 + Dog tag with your name and faction embossed

SKY COMMANDER:
Lieutenant Commander Rewards
 w/ Your name in the credits as ‘Distinguished Backer’
 w/ 3 exclusive backer T-shirts (1 of each faction and Leviathan)
 + 1 Custom Leviathan 'Sextant' Desk prop

SKY CAPTAIN:
Copy of the game (Platform choice) /

Free iTunes download of Game Soundtrack /

SKY REAR-ADMIRAL CONSTRUCTION:
Sky Captain Rewards
 w/ 1 Custom Leviathans 'Sextant' Desk prop
 w/ 1 Copy of each Faction Fleet set

SKY REAR-ADMIRAL TRAINING:
Sky Rear-Admiral Construction Rewards
 w/ Copy of Leviathans Box Set + Faction Fleet set of choice
 + Design custom skins for chosen Faction Fleet

SKY REAR-ADMIRAL FLEET:\r\nSky Rear-Admiral Training Rewards\r\n+ Design custom ship/unit for chosen faction/fleet + Name their ship option (can connect directly with the team via Skype during design)
THIRD SKY LORD:\r\nSky Rear-Admiral Fleet Rewards\r\n + Design and add Likeness to an NPC (can connect directly with the team via Skype during design)

SECOND SKY LORD:
***North America Only / 
Third Sky Lord Rewards
 + Afternoon @ Lemonade Labs/Hyper Hippo Studio (w/Lance Priebe, Randall Bills, & Production team sitting in design session + play a game of Leviathans)

FIRST SKY LORD / SKY ADMIRAL:
***North America Only / 
Second Sky Lord Rewards
 + Lance Priebe/Randall Bills will come to your home town & run a massive game with you and guests of your choice
